Executives face charges for illegally shipping high-end GPUs, crucial for AI and potentially military use, to restricted destinations. Several arrests and guilty pleas have been made.

His optimistic outlook fuels his remarkable longevity and active engagement with the world.

Singh's selfless act, despite his injury, allowed Tendulkar to score 103 runs and subsequently earn his India selection. Tendulkar expressed deep gratitude for Singh's remarkable gesture and commitment to supporting a teammate.

Despite their fearsome reputation and potential for spaghettification, these celestial bodies pose no threat to Earth and play a crucial role in shaping galaxies, revealing the universe's underlying patterns.

description: A parliamentary standing committee has highlighted repeated disruptions in major NTA exams, including UGC-NET, CSIR-NET, NEET-PG, NEET-UG, CUET and JEE Main. The panel recommended a shift towards pen-and-paper testing, citing successful CBSE and UPSC models, and urged that CBTs be held only in government-controlled centres. It also called for a nationwide blacklist of tainted vendors and advised using NTA’s Rs 448-crore surplus to strengthen internal exam capabilities and regulatory systems.

description: Brothers Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra's rapid expansion of their Romeo Lane brand, fueled by a successful Goa outlet, has hit a tragic snag. Following a fatal incident at their 'island bar,' questions are mounting over safety clearances and operational oversight. Franchisees express disillusionment, and the brand faces an uncertain future amid industry calls for accountability.

title: Brittany Mahomes goes silent after Mahomes-Kelce meltdown hits Chiefs
description: Kansas City Chiefs faced a tough loss against the Houston Texans. Quarterback Patrick Mahomes and player Travis Kelce struggled on the field. Brittany Mahomes, wife of Patrick Mahomes, remained silent on social media after the game. This quiet response mirrored the disappointment felt by many fans. The team's playoff hopes are now uncertain.

title: Ayesha Curry admits feeling anger when women try to pursue Stephen Curry
description: Ayesha Curry revealed on 'Red Table Talk' that she sometimes feels the urge to confront women who approach her husband, Stephen Curry, due to his naturally friendly demeanor. She later expressed regret about her appearance on the show, attributing the backlash to the platform's chaotic nature and the misinterpretation of her words.

title: Gabrielle Union says she and Dwyane Wade 'weren’t in a good place' when he fathered a child
description: Gabrielle Union has opened up about the devastation she felt when Dwyane Wade fathered a child with another woman during a brief breakup in 2013. Despite the trauma, the couple worked through the issue, with Wade admitting their marriage isn't perfect and requires ongoing effort. They reunited and married in 2014.

title: Inside George Springer’s fairytale life with his wife Charlise Castro
description: Charlise Castro, a former Division I softball standout and America East Player of the Year, forged her own path beyond being George Springer's wife. After excelling in athletics, she pursued an MBA and built a credible career in wellness coaching, demonstrating ambition and resilience. Her journey highlights how partners of elite athletes can cultivate independent identities and success.

title: Want to use your old smartphone as a home security camera? How to set it up
description: Transform your old smartphone into a home security camera with a simple app. This cost-effective DIY solution allows you to monitor your home, children, or pets remotely. By installing a security app on your old phone and your current device, you can set up a functional surveillance system. While convenient, be aware of limitations compared to professional cameras.

title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias 2025 net worth: Career, music and business
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.
